column4: I have recommended Ubuntu several times. What is so special about this distribution?
have been...
boot the livecd and find out :-)
what should I be looking for?
is wifi easy to configure on ubuntu?
please see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CommonQuestions
thanks
okay, I will try the livecd first
excuse my ignorance I can't find the livecd image under pub/ubuntu
what is the name of the file?
www.ubuntu.com
then click on the download picture
http://mirror.internode.on.net/pub/ubuntu/
traffic is counted on my isp, unless I use their mirror
http://mirror.internode.on.net/pub/ubuntu/releases/7.04/ubuntu-7.04-desktop-i386.iso
for 32bit version
http://mirror.internode.on.net/pub/ubuntu/releases/7.04/MD5SUMS for the md5sum (to check before burning the iso)
thanks
and for 64 bit version duo core, not amd?
it has the side effect of checking if isos could be intact too aubade :)
amd64 is for core 2 duo as well
